errors.error_create_org: Could not create organization, please reload this page.

dashboard/error/unauthorized.message: You are unauthorized for this action

dashboard/documents.title: Documents
dashboard/documents.description: Upload word, pdfs, excel or text documents here

uploadDialog.title: Upload Files
uploadDialog.description: Upload PDF, word or excel documents

dashboard/members.title: Manage members
dashboard/members.description: Manage existing users and invite new ones to your organization.

inviteDialog.title: Invite New User
inviteDialog.description: Fill in the details to invite a new user to your organization.

errors.invite_not_found: Invitation error, could not join organization
errors.unknown_error: Invitation error, could not join organization

error/no-access.title: You have no access to this organization

account.title: Account settings
account.description: Make changes to your profile here.

account/password.title: Change password
account/password.description: Change or set a password for your account.

validation.image-type: File format must be either jpg, jpeg, webp or png.
validation.size: File can't be bigger than {maxSizeMb} mb

profile-picture-uploader.instructions: Click the pencil to change your avatar

logo-uploader.instructions: Click the pencil to change your logo

invite-member-form.emailDescription: Enter the e-mail of the person to invite.
invite-member-form.roleDescription: OWNER role has full access. MEMBER role has limited access

successToast.title: Member invited
successToast.description: Member invited to the team, an email has been sent.

successToast.title: Password updated
successToast.description: Password was updated successfully. On next login use the new password.

securityWarning.title: Security warning
securityWarning.description: Your account does not have any password set, you have logged in using a provider. Passwords are generally not recommended, but can be set if you want to use password based login.

forgot-password-form.title: Forgot password
forgot-password-form.description: We will send you an e-mail with instructions

emailSentToast.title: E-mail sent
emailSentToast.description: Open your email and follow the instructions

errors.unknown_error: Could not reset password, please try again
errors.account_has_no_password: Account does not have password, please login with the provider you used for this email.

errors.notVerified: Account not validated yet, go to your email and validate your account.

notVerifiedDialog.title: Account not verified yet
notVerifiedDialog.body: Your account is not verified yet, check your e-mail. If you have not received an email, check spam or try resending the verification email.

success.title: Success
success.description: Password reset success, login using your new password

verificationEmailSent.title: Verification e-mail sent
verificationEmailSent.description: In order to login, go to your email and verify your account.

errors.account_exist: You already have an account registered to this email

instructions.valid: Verify your account on {appName} by clicking Verify account below.

verificationTokenResent.description: Your verification token has been sent, please close this window.

verificationExpired.title: Verification expired
verificationExpired.body: Your verification link has expired, you may send a new verification email below.

errors.token_does_not_exist: Verification token does not exist, already verified?

emails.subject: Password reset request on {appName}
emails.message: You or someone else have requested to change passsword on {appName}

reset-password.subject: Password reset request on {appName}
reset-password.message: You or someone else have requested to change passsword on {appName}

welcome-registration.subject: Verify your account on {appName}
welcome-registration.message: You have successfully created an account on {appName}, you will need to verify your account before you can log in.

organization-invitation.subject: You have been invited to join organization {organizationName} on {appName}
organization-invitation.preview: You have been invited to join organization {organizationName} on {appName}
organization-invitation.instructions: To accept the invitation click the link below.

drop.description-single: Drop your file here or click to select a file
drop.description-multi: Drop your files here or click to select a file
drop.description-loading: Please wait, this might take a moment

remove-dialog.title: Are you sure?
remove-dialog.body: Are you sure you want to delete {fileName}?

confirm.title: Confirm removal
confirm.body: Are you sure you want to remove {email} from the organization?

member.remove_self: You can not remove your self from the organization.
member.change_role_self: You can not change the role of your self
